data: Some twenty and odd years ago there stood a little cabin at the foot of a round hill, that very much resembled a cupola in shape, and which, from its position and height, commanded a prospect of singular beauty.

The Black Prophet: A Tale Of Irish Famine
Traits And Stories Of The Irish Peasantry, The Works of
William Carleton, Volume Three
